about_the_game:
Taigania combines classic isometric action RPG mechanics, inspired by previous titles such as Diablo and Path of Exile, with co-operative, procedurally generated open-world exploration reminiscent of games like Valheim and Minecraft. Choose your class, slay creatures, gather loot, craft items, discover villages, and explore a massive open world with 1-8 players in online co-op in this isometric action RPG fantasy adventure.

EXPLORATION

Explore a massive procedurally generated open world. Discover caves and dungeons, filled with dangerous creatures, gatherable resources, epic boss battles, and loot. You can choose between WASD movement or the traditional click-to-move, depending on your preference.

COMBAT

Experience classic isometric action RPG combat with a variety of abilities to strike your enemies or aid your allies. Taigania aims to provide player combat synergies in co-op, enabling a rewarding multiplayer experience. Each class has access to a dual-resource system, where abilities consume either stamina or mana. Furthermore, combat mechanics such as active blocking and sprinting consume stamina.

VILLAGES

Villages are located throughout the open world and serve as your base of operations for adventures, granting access to various gameplay features, such as item crafting and storage. You may also choose to build new structures, which modify the playable content within the village's region of influence.

BOSS BATTLES

Engage in epic boss battles, accompanied by themed orchestral soundtracks, to acquire special crafting patterns, materials, equipments, skill gems, and other loot to further empower your character.

CHARACTER BUILD CUSTOMIZATION

  • Every class has access to various abilities, of which 5 can be simultaneously slotted to the skill bar.

  • Abilities scale from attributes (strength, dexterity, intelligence, constitution, spirit). Most abilities have various effects that scale from different attributes.

  • Every piece of armor grants attributes. Craft and equip armor pieces that grant attributes that suit your playstyle.

  • Armor pieces may also grant stats (such as critical strike chance, health regeneration, and over 60 more). Higher rarity armor pieces grant more stats. Craft and equip armor pieces that grant stats that complement your playstyle.

  • Gather skill gems, which can be slotted into abilities to alter their properties (such as reduced cooldown, increased damage with increased cooldown, conversion of an offensive spell into a healing spell, and many more). Skill gems come in different tiers of rarity, and the total number of slotted skill gems per ability is limited.

  • Gain access to an arsenal of Masteries, which alter the playstyle of your character. Only one mastery can be active at a given time. For example:

    1) Using a strike skill increases the damage of your next slam skill by 10%, stacking up to 3 times. Using a slam skill empowers your next strike skill to regenerate 10 additional stamina, stacking up to 3 times.
    2) Gain 40% more health regeneration from all sources. This effect is doubled when below 35% health. Applying a hard crowd-control effect on an enemy grants X health regeneration for 12 seconds, stacking up to 3 times.
    3) Using an ability increases your size and area of effect by 8%, stacking up to 5 times. At 5 stacks, your next ability deals 70% more damage, consuming all stacks.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains mild violence and mild undead/demonic themes.

detailed_description:
Feature List

  • Play solo or with up to 8 players in online co-op on player-hosted worlds.

  • Explore a massive, procedurally generated open world.

  • Discover randomly generated dungeons and caves located throughout the world.

  • Choose from multiple fantasy RPG classes such as Cleric, Colossus, Executioner, Paladin, Pyromancer, and more.

  • Experience a deep and engaging character-gearing system with attributes (strength, dexterity, intelligence, constitution, spirit) and stats (such as critical strike chance, health regeneration, chance to apply ailments, poise, and over 60 more).

  • Enjoy classic isometric ARPG combat featuring a dual-resource system with stamina and mana, along with additional combat mechanics such as active blocking and sprinting.

  • Encounter a variety of hostile creatures with both creature-specific and world loot table drops, providing an engaging item-crafting experience.

  • Engage in epic boss battles accompanied by themed orchestral soundtracks.

  • Relax with non-combat RPG activities such as fishing, mining, blacksmithing, cooking, and more.

  • Discover villages to gain access to various gameplay features, such as item crafting and storage.

  • Choose between WASD movement or the traditional click-to-move, depending on your preference.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Quad Core or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 or Radeon HD 7970
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum System Requirements may change in the future
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-11600K, 3.9 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 5600X, 3.7 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070, 8 GB or AMD Radeon RX 590, 8 GB
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended System Requirements may change in the future
